summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multiple authorities selection feature for both web and mobile app. All core functionality is working correctly including checkbox selection, Auto-Assign All button, selected count badge, removable tags, and snag table display of multiple authorities.
passed_tests: Backend API: /api/users/authorities returns 3 authorities for selection
Backend API: Create snag with multiple authorities (assigned_authority_ids array) works correctly
Backend API: /api/snags returns assigned_authority_ids and assigned_authority_names arrays
Backend API: Multiple authorities saved and retrieved correctly
Web App: Checkbox list shows all available authorities (3 authorities displayed)
Web App: Multiple authorities can be selected using checkboxes
Web App: Selected count badge shows correctly (e.g., '2 selected')
Web App: Auto-Assign All button visible and functional when suggestions available
Web App: Selected authorities shown as removable tags with X buttons
Web App: Snag table has 'Authorities' column showing multiple authorities
Web App: Multiple authority tags displayed correctly in snag rows
Web App: Suggested authorities section shows based on building history
Integration: Frontend-backend integration for multiple authorities works seamlessly
Integration: Auto-Assign functionality selects suggested authorities correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All API endpoints support multiple authorities correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components for multiple authorities working perfectly
